WorkItem.Description:
I think they should be cross assignable. Currently it is not the case : 
```
var interfaceBased:Array;
var keywordBased=[];
interfaceBased=keywordBased; // Error
keywordBased=interfaceBased; // Error  

```
[Try it](http://www.typescriptlang.org/Playground/#src=var%20interfaceBased%3AArray%3B%0Avar%20keywordBased%3D%5B%5D%3B%0AinterfaceBased%3DkeywordBased%3B%20%2F%2F%20Error%0AkeywordBased%3DinterfaceBased%3B%20%2F%2F%20Error%20%20%0A)

Comments.Message: Thanks, this looks like a bug. Marked as active.
